title: FS: T200 Fatima Cleveland PSA 1.5 - Joe Jackson & Nap Lajoie (SOLD)
author: babraham

posts.post_title: FS: T200 Fatima Cleveland PSA 1.5 - Joe Jackson & Nap Lajoie (SOLD)
posts.post_content:
1913 Fatima Team T200 Cleveland Americans
Freshly graded PSA 1.5
Featuring Shoeless Joe Jackson & Nap Lajoie

$SOLD

Paypal F&F preferred
Thank you for looking!

[IMG]https://i.ibb.co/hynNZC2/IMG-3445.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://i.ibb.co/m86zJ6k/IMG-3446.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://i.ibb.co/CVfpbDL/IMG-3447.jpg[/IMG]

[quote name="Casey2296" post=2255759]Nice card Brian[/QUOTE]

Thanks!  Hoping to keep it in the Net54 family if anyone is wanting it.
Just got a PSA 4 upgrade for this card, so selling off the PSA 1.5.

Price drop on this sweet card!  
Cheapest Joe Jackson playing days card on the market, I'd guess.  :)

Didn't get much interest here, so card is now on ebay...ends tomorrow:

[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/155152663516[/url]

Thank you!

God I hate ebay sometimes.
The card is back up for sale it seems.
Winning bidder sniped it at the last second with a bid of $1626 but now hasn't replied to any messages or made payment.

I'll offer it here for $1425 (I would have received about $1430 after ebay fees).  

There's currently a SGC 2 in Lelands auction that's over $1500 already with 2 days remaining, so I feel my price is quite fair.

ps - avoid ebay seller mooseandmillersports

sorry to hear that.

Good luck with the sale

Classic ebay fun.  :D

Card has been sold to a fellow Net54 member, received payment this morning.  

So then I went into the ebay transaction and cancelled it.
Not 7 minutes later, I finally get a response from the buyer, saying he got busy but was planning to pay "soon".  The first contact he's sent since he won the auction last Wednesday.  Haha, sorry man, the card is now sold.  ;) :D
